en.answer: Even if the ATK of Galaxy Knight is less than 1000 when its effect resolves, its ATK will be still be reduced by 1000, and it will Special Summon the targeted Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon from the Graveyard.
en.question:
If I activate the effect of Galaxy Knight after Summoning it without Tributing, and then an effect such as Number C32: Shark Drake Veiss is chained to cause the ATK of Galaxy Knight to become less than 1000, what happens when it resolves?

(T/L Note: The title asks whether the effect will activate, but the question asks about a situation in which it was already activated. We assume this is simply an oversight, and that the title should be the same as the question.)
en.title: If the ATK of Galaxy Knight Summoned without Tributing is less than 1000, will its effect activate?

ja.answer: チェーンして発動した「<<10261>>」の効果によって、「<<10339>>」の攻撃力が1000未満になった場合でも、「<<10339>>」自身の攻撃力を1000ポイントダウンさせ、自分の墓地から「<<9729>>」1体を特殊召喚します。
ja.question: リリース無しで召喚した「<<10339>>」の効果の発動にチェーンして「<<10261>>」等の効果を発動し、「<<10339>>」の攻撃力が1000未満になった場合、「<<10339>>」の効果処理はどうなりますか？
ja.title: リリースなしで召喚された「<<10339>>」の攻撃力が1000未満の場合、効果は発動しますか？
